entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine Copy_MultipleSegments #60904
  • Quarantine ServerCompressedStreaming #60903
  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries #60899
  • gRPC Transcoding: Invalid value for enum error when string enums enabled, integer values in swagger when string enums disabled #60898
  • Converting Blazor app from full WASM to Hybrid breaks PWA offline functionality #60895
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis 9.3.0 - when using HybridCache RedisCacheImpl.IsHybridCacheDefined causes infinite recursion #60894
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IISServerOptions Class not existing in 9.0.103 (Linux) #60892
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60890
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https #60889

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #60891
  • Perf regression: https #60841
  • Event handlers (e.g., @onclick) not working in Blazor .NET 8 layout components #60640
  • Blazor Quickgrid Sorting causes problem with Paging #60685
  • Auto Column feature for QuickGrid #60842
  • Query around augmenting and verifying claims in Blazor Server #60749
  • Perf improvement: json #60877

PullRequests

Created

  • Bundle the .NET Runtime in the archives in the VMR as well #60905
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix preserving messages for stateful reconnect with backplane #60900
    area-signalr
  • List Microsoft.AspNetCore.App in PackageOverrides.txt #60897
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Quarantine EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation #60876
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Only build platform-specific native assets in native build in VMR #60896
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Use the host version that corresponds with the LKG SDK #60888
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Prevent RefreshSignInAsync if it is called with wrong user #60881
    area-identity, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Quarantine recent flaky tests #60906
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, blog-candidate, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add doc owners column to area owners table #60818
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Support for declaratively persisting component and services state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2661555 #60872
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Improve ignored directives proposal ordering #9212
  • Add `#:` example to ignored directives proposal #9211
  • Update ignored directives proposal #9210

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EFCore 8.0.13 Linq query using Enum.GetValues().Cast<int>() fails #35777

Closed

  • EF Core fails to translate LINQ query with null-conditional projection in OrderBy clause #35778
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35770
    9.0.4
  • [BUG] Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design 9.0.1+ does not respect connection strings in usersecrets.json #35774
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #35773
  • Configure PrincipleToDependent property in one-to-one relationship #35771
  • Existing Migration file which renames table from XXX to YYY and creates a new table XXX produces KeyNotFoundException #35323
    10.0.0
  • Fails to translate query using typed projection where anonymous object works fine #35775
  • Query/Test: add relationship test model which only contains references (no collections) #35707
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35162 - Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: MigrationBuilder.DropTable Causes Issues with Subsequent Table Recreation #35776
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35772
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35769

Merged

  • Fix to #21006 - Support a default value for non-nullable properties #35746
  • Navigation test refactoring - improving structure for scenarios that don't support collections #35711
  • Targeted fix for #35162 - Regression from EF Core 8 to 9: MigrationBuilder.DropTable Causes Issues with Subsequent Table Recreation #35764
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #35765
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #35766

Updated

  • Redact constants that get inlined from variables into query in log #35724
  • Fix to #35299 - EF Core InMemory database throws an argument exception on Nullable<>.ToString #35763

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Swapping out the content of a RefreshView breaks on Android #28361
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [testing] Re enable some tests for visual comparison #28358
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Header and Footer Not Visible in CollectionView When EmptyView is Selected First #28351
  • PopToRootAsync results in a Deadlock #28344
  • C6_Refresh_View - Progress spinner is not disabled. #28343
  • `dotnet workload update` fails with the Android installer missing error after updating to .NET SDK v9.0.201 #28342
  • Scrolling performance will be slower when using remote iOS simulator from Windows machine. #28341
  • Error: There is no browser renderer with ID 3 #28339
  • CollectionView HeaderTemplate and FooterTemplate are not displayed when ItemsSource is initially set to null #28337
  • [Windows] EmptyViewTemplate not displayed when ItemsSource is initially set to a list and then set to Null #28334
  • Binding to dictionary with string key #28333

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] [iOS] Image layout issue in MAUI 8 (regression, worked correct in MAUI 7) #18983
  • [Android] CollectionView Footer Positioned Incorrectly #28350
  • ITMS-91061: Missing privacy manifest #28262

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Check if RefreshControl is enabled on iOS #28365
  • [ci] Remove macios workaround to build net9 #28363
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Enable improved VS component IDs #28362
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Check if RefreshControl is enabled on iOS #28360
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
  • Make it safer to set TestCases.HostApp main page #28355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android][iOS] WebView Navigated event not triggered when using HtmlWebViewSource #28354
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Add SingleSelectionFollowsFocus Platform Specific property #28352
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28346
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation. #28340
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.5 to 1.6.6 #28338
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor not working for Focused Visual State #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) 2 #28331
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] Revert "Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar" #28232
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [Android] Android: Native View not set exception on modal page - fix #28200
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [ci] Add net10.0 to triggers #28359
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Obsolete TableView #28302
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28312
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Obsolete TableView #28327
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [ci] Fix provisionator #28325
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28345
  • [ci] Fix platform for UItests for iOS #28328
    area-testing, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • What if we did not use dictionaries? #28322
  • Fix for Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #28315
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Fixed crash in CollectionView on iOS when updating grouped data. #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6

    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Correct the preview experience for `Implement Using Copilot` #77572
  • Revisit API design for `ICopilotCodeAnalysisService.IsAvailableAsync` #77566
  • Source Generator ordering #77560
  • Exception in `IntroduceVariableCodeRefactoringProvider` when invoked on typecast #77559
  • Inconsistent behaviour between var vs explicit type when used with out parameter and conditional expression #77558

Closed

  • Run Code Analysis continues to be broken #77495
  • False Positive in Analyzer IDE0052 when ref Fields are involved #77251
  • NullReferenceException is thrown when caret touches `orderby` in LINQ expression #76972
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10411.19 #77557
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10411.20 #77556
  • Field-backed properties: support lazily initialized backing field in nullable analysis #76662
    .NET 10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.idex.dev18roaming-35911.231 #77547

PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: address some delegate conversion issues #77574
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Emit 'Extension' attribute on a type with an extension declaration. #77573
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Add feature flag controlling Copilot prompt in Semantic Search #77562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Corrected newly content that needs to be translated into Chinese #77555
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Extensions: Handle lowering for collection initializers #77549
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged

Merged

  • Extensions: Handle explicit type arguments #77532
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix run code analysis on solution not reporting results #77501
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Disable downloading the runtime packages during restore and instead ensure that it happens when needed (pack) #77515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Simple and safe performance changes to package load code. #77561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix incremental generator in deterministic key file #77553
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Implementation methods for extension properties are not extension methods #77551
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77519
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support inference in collection expressions #77534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix NFW due to invoking Workspace.RaiseEventForHandlers in the CA process #77546
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update message for analyzer referencing newer compiler than host #77541
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77575
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add CI validation of Semantic Search API lists #77535
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure ExtensionMethodReferenceRewriter rewrites all the "interesting" method references. #77540
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Ref Fields
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issue with disappearing newlines after multiline documentation comment #77521
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • [Personal Review Only] Prototype/field nullability 3 #77491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add RuntimeAsyncMethodGenerationAttribute #77543
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement pinning for container images consumed in dotnet/runtime #113455
  • MetadataUpdateHandler not working in custom host #113452
  • Process.Start with RedirectStandardOutput fails with System.PlatformNotSupportedException in .NET 9 #113450
  • Change build pipeline to use Azure Linux VM #113439
  • BufferedStream LOH allocations #113438
  • System.IO.Ports SerialPort.Open somehow entering into WmMouseUp events #113433
  • plan app build infrastructure #113431
  • pin.exe does not work with latest windows update #113430
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeFixes unable to load the requested types #113428
  • Office COM addin targeting .NET 10 Preview 1 cannot be registered 0x80008096 #113427
  • [NativeAOT][iOS] App Hangs/Freezes with Static Virtual Properties in Interfaces on .NET 9 #113423
  • OOM in Dns query can crash #113419
    10.0.0
  • Windows Shutdown ETW Recording for JITed stacks is not working. #113412
  • Semaphore performance issue #113411
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add ApplicationVersion to IHostEnvironment #113410

Closed

  • PublicKey.ExportSubjectPublicKeyInfo() fails when parameters are absent #110715
    10.0.0
  • ARM32 SIMD / NEON instruction set support #113317
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/leave/catch2_r/catch2_r.dll under jitstress 2 #113417
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] [.NET Framework 4.8] [x86] System.Diagnostics HttpHandler test failure: Remote process failed with an unhandled exception #112426
    10.0.0
  • Feature Request: Bind Type Discriminator to Property in System.Text.Json Polymorphic Deserialization #113421
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.StreamTests_Sync.HandleCollectionsAsync #70644
    Future
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.SerializationWithPerTypeAttributeContextTests.RoundTripIndexViewModel #67830
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProviderMetadataTests.GetProviderNames_AssertProperties #64888
    Future
  • Test failure Loader\\AssemblyDependencyResolver\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests\\AssemblyDependencyResolverTests.cmd #63143
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow me to bring my own HttpClient implementations #113395
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Specification.UnityDependencyInjectionSpecificationTests.FactoryServicesAreCreatedAsPartOfCreatingObjectGraph #51832
    Future
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.TokenExpirationTests.PostEvictionCallbacksGetInvokedWhenMemoryCacheEntriesExpireWithAnActiveChangeToken #49633
    Future
  • [x86][Windows][JitStress2] eventsourcetrace: Unhandled Exception: System.Exception: Read past end of stream. #12642
    Future
  • JIT: pgostress hitting assert in vector division #113393
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>.AddRange(Span<T>) and List<T>.AddRange(ReadOnlySpan<T>) #113415
  • [API Proposal]: Predefined `InlineArrayX<T>` types up to some X #111973
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] Self-signed certificates flood Windows Security event log #108966
    8.0.x
  • Proposal: Include Actual Error Message in Exception Thrown by EnsureSuccessStatusCode() #113408
  • JIT: Bad result with modulo on linux-arm64 #113320
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][interp] Add SN Vector intrinsics #113456
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Refactor Sequential/Explicit layout to happen in the same phase where we do Auto layout #113454
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove FileExtensionSignInfos for .deb, .rpm, & .pkg #113451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113449
    needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Propagate exceptions in `GetAddressInfoExCallback` #113444
    area-System.Net
  • Host: fix Cancellation not aborting Start in some cases #113442
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [8.0] Update Ubuntu pipelines from 18.04 to 22.04 #113441
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor assertprop a bit #113440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink : Fix instantiation tracking issue with icall/pinvoke parameters #113437
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SafeFileHandle.ThreadPoolValueTaskSource made ligher by one field #113435
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Fix instantiation tracking bug with `[Intrinsic]` methods. #113434
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Run stress tests nightly against staging branches #113432
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] initial build of coreclr.runtime #113429
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add trim-safe ValidationContext constructor #113426
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch to AwesomeAssertions #113425
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0-staging] JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113418
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Initial CoreClr Android logcat log integration. #113416
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow NTLM tests on newer Linux distributions #113414
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Hang on when GetRequestStreamAsync #113409
    area-System.Net
  • Fixing stack overflow in System.Private.CoreLib (issue #113189) #113407

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Implement debug checks for correct memory handling #3037
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Refactor projected C# classes to invoke `Destroy` function #3036
  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Refactor projection tooling to project value types with ref properties as C# classes #3035

Closed

  • [SwiftBindings] Add NominalTypeDescriptor support #2799
  • [Projection tooling] Modular string-based C# and Swift code emitters #2955
  • [SwiftBindings] Unify code emition #2891
  • [SwiftBindings] Revert emitting Swift projection on error #2890

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift Bindings] Project value types with heap-allocated properties as C# classes #3038
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • Fix a typo from upstream merge #3039

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Add support for Equality protocol #3031
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [WIP][swift] Use of TBD files to retrieve symbols missing from abi.json #3034
    * NO MERGE *, area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support ephemeral execution for `dotnet tool run` similar to npx, docker, and uv #47517
  • ApiCompat tool incorrectly handles RequiredUnreferencedCodeAttribute and possible other AOT attributes. #47513
  • Use CDN urls instead of blob.core.windows.net for downloading runtime/aspnetcore assets #47503
  • Ensure `TestTfmsInParallel` works for the new dotnet test experience #47496
    10.0.1xx
  • Consider using interpolated string handlers for `LogTrace` in new dotnet test experience #47495
    10.0.1xx
  • New dotnet test experience should produce binlog for the evaluation done to calculate TestModules #47494
    10.0.1xx

Closed

  • How to add .dcproj into solution via dotnet sdk #4100
  • Unable to use `dotnet sln add` to add an esproj to a solution #36617
    Backlog
  • `dotnet list package` command is not functioning after upgrading to 9.0.200 when an SLNX solution file is present in the folder #46763
  • Case sensitivity for `/bl` is incosistent #47481

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47526
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add comment for updating version #47520

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

  • Extract nuget packages from redist-installer infra #47502
